title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.2 - Noncompetitive class
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 477.2 - Noncompetitive class

State Regulations

By virtue of the character of their duties and/or the nature
of the relationship that they bear to the superintendent, it is impracticable
to hold competitive examinations for the following positions that shall be
filled after a noncompetitive process, except where in the judgment of the
superintendent, qualified members should be assigned to the position of

Supervisor of State Police Public Relations, or to the positions of Director of

Personnel, Assistant Director of Personnel State Police, Director of State

Police Communications, Assistant Director of State Police Communications, and

Director of State Police Employee Assistance Program or to the positions in the

State Police Laboratory, including the position of Director of State Police

Laboratory: (a) Administrative

Aide

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
